mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.sum, e.account_id, e.date, e.expense_category_id AS ec_id, ec.name AS ec_name, ec.user_id AS ec_user_id, ec.access_to_delete AS ec_access_to_delete FROM expense e LEFT JOIN expense_category ec ON ec.id = e.expense_category_id WHERE e.date <= #{beforeDate} AND e.date >= #{afterDate} AND ec.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY e.date DESC
SELECT e.id, e.sum, e.account_id, e.date, e.expense_category_id AS ec_id, ec.name AS ec_name FROM expense e LEFT JOIN expense_category ec ON ec.id = e.expense_category_id WHERE e.id=#{expenseId}
